profile.name: Jamie Chien
profile.brief: Passionate Frontend Developer with a strong knack for creativity and highly skilled in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js. I excel in writing detailed technical documentation and am skilled at effective communication. My commitment to staying updated with the latest trends and technologies allows me to deliver innovative solutions that bridge user experience with cutting-edge frontend development.

work.company: Shoalter Technology Ltd. (Member of HKTV Group)
description: Optimized Git flow methodology for team collaboration, streamlining code integration, version control, and release management processes, resulting in increased efficiency and code quality.
Built a separate development environment by adjusting CI, Docker and Kubernetes to ensure an effective testing process.
Assisted the team leader in the recruitment process by conducting technical interviews.

work.company: Shoalter Technology Ltd. (Member of HKTV Group)
description: Led a cross-functional team of four members in the successful development and implementation of a front-end service, ensuring progress toward project milestones and client satisfaction.
Implemented reusable components with Next.js, Ant Design and TailwindCSS, and revamping legacy code according to requirements.
Developed comprehensive unit tests using Jest which increased test coverage by about 30%.
Mentored five junior team members, fostering their growth in frontend development, code best practices and project execution.
Developed responsive web pages using React.js, Redux, CSS, and running on Line Frontend-end Framework (LIFF).
Implemented Line Bots using Node.js and Bottender.js.
Built server-side rendered web app and deployed to Google Cloud Platform (Firebase).
Implemented Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) communication system on Raspberry Pi and Android using Node.js and React Native.

projects.name: Shozzle
description: Co-created and maintain the technology blog using Astro.
Author and publish insightful articles to share knowledge and expertise.
Pioneered and implemented innovative features by conceiving and proposing creative ideas, enhancing blog functionality and user experience.

projects.name: Mirror xd
description: Collaborated closely with four team members to develop a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) for a puzzle game.
Established a team-specific Scrum process to ensure that the development stays on the right track.
Responsible for UI design and programming development within the team.
Nominated by Bahamut ACG Award in 2021
